Class AbstractTemplateContext

java.lang.Object
de.s42.dlt.parser.AbstractTemplateContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
TemplateContext
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultTemplateContext
public abstract class AbstractTemplateContext extends Object implements TemplateContext
ATTENTION: For performance reasons and usage aspects TemplateContext is NOT threadsafe!
Author:
Benjamin Schiller

    • resolveTemplate

      public String resolveTemplate(String templateId) throws Exception
      Override this method to change loading of templates in ${include <templateID>} statements It gets the given string and shall return the content string of the included template
      Parameters:
      templateId - given id from include statement
      Returns:
      a string containing the raw template content
      Throws:
      Exception - if the template can not be resolved
